faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Do I need to create an account?
faq.a1: No! MatchOps-Local works immediately without any signup or account creation. Just open the app and start using it.
faq.a2: Yes! Once loaded, MatchOps-Local works completely offline. Perfect for soccer fields with poor internet connectivity.
faq.a3: Updates are automatic when you have an internet connection. The app will notify you when a new version is available and update seamlessly.
faq.a4: Absolutely! You can export your complete data set at any time in JSON format. Your data is yours to keep, backup, and use however you need.
faq.a5: Yes! All data is stored locally on your device using browser IndexedDB. Nothing is transmitted to external servers, ensuring complete privacy and control.

technical.title: Technical Details
technical.desc1: MatchOps Local is a Progressive Web App (PWA). This means it installs like a native app but runs in your web browser.
technical.desc2: All data is stored locally on your device using IndexedDB, a browser database. No internet connection is required after the initial load.
technical.desc3: Compatible with iOS Safari, Android Chrome, and all major desktop browsers.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.a1: Visit matchops.app in your browser. On mobile, tap the share button (iOS) or menu (Android) and select 'Add to Home Screen' or 'Install App'.
faq.a2: All data is stored locally on your device in IndexedDB (browser storage). Nothing is sent to external servers.
faq.q3: Can I use it on multiple devices?
faq.a3: Yes, but you'll need to export your data from one device and import it on another. There's no automatic syncing since everything is stored locally.
faq.q4: How do I back up my data?
faq.a4: Open the Settings menu and use the Export function. This creates a JSON file with all your data that you can save and import later.
faq.a5: No. MatchOps Local is completely free and open source. No subscription, no ads, no hidden costs.
